Instance.description: Tested Greetings represent nodes in a tree structure.

TunableVariant.name: context_testing
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, advanced testing will be performed based on the social interaction that led to this greeting. First, the Prohibited Interaction Tags are checked and we fail the test if the source interaction contains one or more of them. Second, the Context Override Interaction Tags are checked, and we immediately pass if the source interaction contains one or more of them. Third, the Context Test Set is run, and determines the final result. Example: User does a mean social, but has positive rel, and we don't want them to hug the target. So we put the tag for MeanSocials in the prohibited tags to fail the hug greeting. Example: User does a mean social, but has positive rel, and we want them to play a glare greeting. So we move the rel test to the context test set, and put tags for MeanSocials in the context override tags so that it ignores the rel test.

TunableList.name: context_override_interaction_tags
TunableList.description: Interaction Category Tags that, if the source interaction contains one or more of them, will ignore the context test set.

TunableEnum.description: These tag values are used for testing the source interaction that started a greeting.

TunableVariant.name: context_test_set
TunableVariant.description: If tuned, tunable tests that run between the actor and target Sim. If the test set passes, we either play a greeting or run through another instance with tests. These are essentially tests that would live in the regular tests but we want them to be ignored if a particular interaction is triggering the greeting. If no tests are tuned, we will treat this as a test failure. These tests will NOT run if Context Override Interaction Tags are tuned and the source interaction has one of them. This will cause these tests to auto-pass (even if this tunable is disabled).

TdescFragTag.name: allow_based_on_tests
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

TunableList.name: prohibited_interaction_tags
TunableList.description: Interaction Category Tags that, if the source interaction contains one or more of them, will fail this Tested Greeting and move to the next.
